0.name: Crysis 3
0.description: The hunted becomes the hunter in the CryEngine-powered open-world shooter Crysis 3. One of the best FPS games with eye candy graphics returns with the final story of the trilogy. Awesome gameplay and storyline.

1.name: Tomb Raider 2013
1.description: Tomb Raider is an action-adventure platform video game. As the first entry in a new Tomb Raider continuity, the game is a reboot that emphasizes the reconstructed origins of the culturally influential lead character Lara Croft
